name: Flesh (itch) (Orange Groove JHB)
description:
Flesh is a fast paced Zombie Shooter.

You wake in total darkness. You can hear sirens in the distance. The lights are out and you hear screaming outside that makes your skin crawl. You tell yourself that nothing ever happens in this small town. You get your gun. The phone doesn't work now and you start to panic. You step outside and a disgusting stench hits you, the stink of rotting flesh! You discover someone has destroyed your car and you end up running down the road toward town. Then a scream for help comes from an abandoned building decaying in a field...

- 7 Levels of intense zombie action
- 4 Different weapons (Hand Gun, Shot Gun, Rail Gun and Rocket launcher)
